attributes.action: Offer sanctuary to Russian military defectors
attributes.additional_details:
The West should offer complete sanctuary to any Russian soldier who is brave enough to defect.

The message must be clearly broadcast in Russian - that if Russians surrender in Ukraine, they will not be kept as prisoners of war in Ukraine - they will be immediately transported West and given a hero's welcome.

Even if 100,000 Russian soldiers accept the offer - it will be nowhere near the millions of Ukrainian refugees we will soon see.

And even if only one chooses it - he deserves freedom.
attributes.background:
Economic sanctions have not deterred Putin, and direct war is not an option.

But there may be Russian soldiers who do not want to kill Ukrainians. Offering the promise of a good life to Russian defectors is one small way that we could degrade Putin's power.  Russian soldiers must have a choice.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what action to take in respect of Russian soldiers who surrender in Ukraine are a matter for the Ukrainian authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
